name: Night Of Bear (Windows-Android)
description:
Your sons have been kidnapped, the great bear spirit is guiding you towards vengeance, before your sons may meet harm. Kill, destroy and fight your way through human civilization armed with your deadly paws and seething rage!

Rescue your sons and escape civilization back to your home in the forest.

This hack and slash adventure has arcade and storymode, with a hidden track only available in arcade and in the gallery.

In Arcade, see how long you can survive the human onslaught. As you gain more kills, the music switches, the scenery changes and the humans increase their armies.

In Story mode, clear each scene and get one step closer to rescuing your bears, exploring each scene and dodging bullets.

There is an unlockable gallery once you complete the game where you can chill out listening to the OST from Kodyak Instrumentals.

Buy the game and support both indie games and underground music :D

Thank you!
